components.name: app-inkpass
reasons: 20260216121000-app-inkpass-patch-fluxos-rebrand.yaml: Update InkPass defaults and Stripe integration references for the FluxOS rebrand

components.name: app-mimic
reasons: 20260216121010-app-mimic-patch-fluxos-rebrand.yaml: Update Mimic provider setup copy and Stripe integration imports for FluxOS branding

components.name: app-tentacle
reasons: 20260216195510-app-tentacle-patch-update-flux-agent-imports.yaml: Update Tentacle flux runtime integration to import flux_agent instead of aios_agent

components.name: pkg-flux-agent
reasons: 20260216195500-pkg-flux-agent-major-rename-package.yaml: Rename the agent package distribution and Python import path from aios-agent/aios_agent to flux-agent/flux_agent

components.name: pkg-fluxos-stripe
reasons: 20260216121020-pkg-fluxos-stripe-major-rename-package.yaml: Rename shared Stripe package from aios-stripe/aios_stripe to fluxos-stripe/fluxos_stripe

components.name: pkg-inkpass-sdk-python
reasons: 20260216121030-pkg-inkpass-sdk-python-patch-update-metadata.yaml: Refresh package metadata to reflect FluxOS contributor naming

notes.summary: Update InkPass defaults and Stripe integration references for the FluxOS rebrand
Update Mimic provider setup copy and Stripe integration imports for FluxOS branding
Rename shared Stripe package from aios-stripe/aios_stripe to fluxos-stripe/fluxos_stripe
Refresh package metadata to reflect FluxOS contributor naming
Rename the agent package distribution and Python import path from aios-agent/aios_agent to flux-agent/flux_agent
Update Tentacle flux runtime integration to import flux_agent instead of aios_agent
